com.google.appinventor.client.settings

Class CommonSettings

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.appinventor.client.settings.CommonSettings
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ProjectSettings, UserSettings

    public abstract class CommonSettings
extends Object
    Superclass for collections of settings.

      CommonSettings()
      Creates new settings object.
